接口 IdentityDAO

  • 所有已知实现类:
    IdentityDbDAO

    public interface IdentityDAO
    Regulate the interface for the data access object
    作者:
    BoJack

        返回:

                                     java.lang.String val)
        Get a identity information
        参数:
        attr - specified attribute
        val - the value for search
        返回:
        the list of identity objects

        参数:

        val - the value to the updated attribute
